subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Long-term contracts for pitchers are full of risk, as the deals for Kevin Brown (7 years), Barry Zito (7) and Mike Hampton (8) have shown. Don’t even ask about Wayne Garland (10).
snippet: Long-term contracts for pitchers are full of risk, as the deals for Kevin Brown (7 years), Barry Zito (7) and Mike Hampton (8) have shown. Don’t even ask about Wayne Garland (10).
